raw_answer:
Patient BIII-8 carries the p.D620N mutation in the VPS35 gene (Table 1: "VPS35 p.D620N A/G" for patient BIII-8).

The text on page 3, first paragraph under "Results" states: "Patients carrying the p.D620N mutation did not have any other variants in all exons of VPS35."

This indicates that no second mutation was found in the VPS35 gene for patient BIII-8.

Therefore, the answer is:
None.
